definition: to peel with a knife/to pare/to cut (a ball at tennis etc)
"knife" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 18)/see also 立刀旁[li4 dao1 pang2]/see also 側刀旁|侧刀旁[ce4 dao1 pang2]
knife-shaved noodles (pared or shaved into strips), a Shanxi specialty
to shave one's head/fig. to become a monk or nun/to take the tonsure
to cut the feet to fit the shoes (idiom); to force sth to fit (as to a Procrustean bed)/impractical or inelegant solution

sentences.english: An Afghan worker cuts firewood to light a brick kiln in Kabul.
sentences.chinese: 在喀布尔，一阿富汗工人削木柴，以点燃砖窑。

sentences.english: Eg: Peeling bags of potatoes is really a chore.
sentences.chinese: 削一袋又一袋洋芋皮真是苦差使。

sentences.english: Knive are used to cut things.
The tool path mode and the feed mode in numerical control milling are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了三轴数控铣削加工的走刀方式和进刀方式。

sentences.english: He cut the ball so that it bounded almost backward.
sentences.chinese: 他斜削这个球，使其几乎向后弹起。

sentences.english: The finished model was manufactured by 3-axis NC milling machine.
sentences.chinese: 最终利用3轴精雕机床进行数控铣削编程加工。

sentences.english: They are easy to pick out because they do not have as sharp a point as wood screws do.
sentences.chinese: 他们是容易辨认，因为他们没有一点为削木螺钉。

sentences.english: This knife is used to peel the fruit.
sentences.chinese: 这把刀子被用来削水果。

sentences.english: You can cut the tension with a knife.
sentences.chinese: 这里气氛紧张得可以用刀来削。

sentences.english: A geometric model suitable for 3-axis milling NC machining graphical simulation system is established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了适用于三轴数控铣削加工图形仿真的几何模型。

sentences.english: Peeling bags of potatoes is really a chore .
sentences.chinese: 削一袋又一袋洋芋皮真是苦差使。

sentences.english: She could peel an apple in one long girlie strip.
sentences.chinese: 她能把苹果皮削成长长秀气的一条。

sentences.english: Through process analysis of NC-miling, it presented kind of treatment and improvement means in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 通过数控铣削工艺分析，提出有关处理与改进方法。

sentences.english: For as far as I can shout, the Number1 sharpener originated in 1900.
sentences.chinese: 据我所知，削自动笔机起源于1900年。

sentences.english: Naivete answered with an apple pared for Kylin.
sentences.chinese: 吴邪一边为他削着苹果一边答道。
这些是我们的削笔刀吗？

definition: knife/blade/single-edged sword/cutlass/CL:把[ba3]/(slang) dollar (loanword)/classifier for sets of one hundred sheets (of paper)/classifier for knife cuts or stabs
a saw/to cut with a saw
to skin/to flay/to excoriate/to peel/to bark at sb/to physically punish sb
same as 剝皮|剥皮[bao1 pi2]
to chop up (meat etc)/to chop off (sb's hand etc)
to rub/to grind/to polish/to sharpen/to wear down/to die out/to waste time/to pester/to insist
to cleave/to split open/to spread open (fingers, legs)
thorn/sting/thrust/to prick/to pierce/to stab/to assassinate/to murder
to chop/to cut down/to throw sth at sb
to cut off (a length)/to stop/to intercept/section/chunk/length
